hero.description: Our team is driven by curiosity, flexibility and collaboration and, of course, our shared love of travel. We are passionate about fostering a space that is inclusive, accessible and empowering for everyone, on our platform and behind the scenes.

projectWork.title: Project-based work
projectWork.description: Project-based work is the belief that what we do determines where and how we work. Some roles are optimised for office work, while others require less face-to-face collaboration and can therefore be done primarily from home. Either way, all full-time employees must spend at least some time in person with their team.

travelers.title: All travellers are welcome
travelers.description: We want our teams to reflect the diverse global travel community we serve. After all, different perspectives, experiences and voices inspire us to think big, act more boldly and remind us that we are better together. Our employee resource groups provide a dedicated space to organise around shared identities and interests.

activityBased.title: Activity-based work
activityBased.description: Activity-based work (ABW) is the belief that what we do determines where and how we work. Some roles are optimised for office work, while others require less face-to-face collaboration and can therefore be done primarily from home. Either way, all full-time employees must spend at least some time in person with their colleagues.

benefits.title: Benefits of working at Local Secrets
benefits.subtitle: Your well-being and happiness is our priority and our benefits support that. It's one of the main reasons people choose to work here.

items.question: What benefits does Local Secrets offer employees?
items.answer: Local Secrets offers various benefits such as work flexibility, health insurance, fruit in the office, and the possibility to buy additional holiday days.

items.question: Are there remote positions available?
items.answer: Yes, Local Secrets offers remote positions depending on the role and project needs.

items.question: Do you offer internship programmes?
items.answer: Yes, we offer internship programmes for students and recent graduates in different departments.

items.question: Is there opportunity for growth in the company?
items.answer: Absolutely. We encourage professional development and offer growth opportunities within the company.

items.question: Where are the offices located?
items.answer: Our main offices are located in the city centre, with easy access to public transport.
